meanings.sent1: The plebs gathered in the town square to listen to the mayor's speech.
meanings.sent2: The plebs enjoyed the festival in the park.
meanings.sent3: The plebs were excited to see a rare double rainbow in the sky.
meanings.sent4: The plebs were like a sea of faces in the crowded stadium.
meanings.sent5: The plebs cheered loudly at the end of the play.

meanings.sent1: The snobbish aristocrat looked down on the plebs with disdain.
meanings.sent2: The plebs worked hard to make ends meet.
meanings.sent3: The plebs joked about their humble origins over a simple meal.
meanings.sent4: In the eyes of the elite, the plebs were mere pawns in the game of power.
meanings.sent5: The plebs lived in modest homes on the outskirts of the city.
